casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Benny STANLEY. No. 592A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. Nora Henry Hargrove, Wilmington, for Stanley. Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of November 2003 by the Attorney General to Dismiss the Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of June 2004."
